xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.12 Hetuduka, Parittattika » 1.12.1 Parittapada » 1.12.1.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Parittattika
Parittapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
361.
767Hetu paritto dhammo hetussa parittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
362.
768Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
769Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
770Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
771(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetu-ārammaṇaup1.12.2 Mahaggatapada >>
